Website Design & Development

Responsive Websites & Web Applications

We design and develop responsive websites and applications with HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Foundation, jQuery, AngularJS, MEAN stack, D3 visualizations, C# ASP.NET, PHP, Perl. Also provide Adobe EchoSign integration.

Content Management Systems

We develop content management systems that are easy to update and search engine friendly. WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, TinyCMS are some of the content management systems that we use.

Online Stores

We develop ecommerce websites that are user friendly and optimized for performance. osCommerce, WooCommerce and Zen Cart are some of the ecommerce platforms we use.

SEO optimizations

We make sure to increase the number of visitors to a website by obtaining a high-ranking placement in search results.

Business Intelligence

BI Applications

We design, develop and implement BI/DW services to build scalable & robust Business Intelligence Applications using MicroStrategy, Microsoft BI, Tableau, and QlikView.

Data Modeling

We design optimized, scalable data models for data warehousing projects.

Mobile BI

We design and develop intuitive and easy-to-use BI applications for Mobile devices.

SDK Customizations

Using MicroStrategy Web, Mobile and Visualization SDK we can help customize your BI applications & create stunning visualizations.
